DOC.criteria: Regardless training status , age range age 18 45 . We limit upper age range increase age associate sarcopenia alteration fiber type 29 would like limit confound effect age . We define lean group BMI < 25 kg/m2 . Weight must stable [ +/ 5 pound ] least three month prior study participant . The untrained subject must engage regular exercise program ( < 30 minute regular exercise 1 week ) . The trained subject participate regular running exercise ( > 45 min/day , â‰¥ 5 days/week ) preferably currently recently participate competition ( within 2 year ) . Regardless training status , subject must medication may affect lipid level , specifically lipid lower agent , birth control pills diuretic . The subject high fat diet ( > 45 % fat ) measure screen questionnaire . We also administer PARQ questionnaire ( attach ) establish whether subject safe exercise testing . The female subject must pregnant . A pregnancy test perform prior study visit . If screen TG > 300 ( base 1st visit result ) fast glucose > 100 ( base 1st visit result ) , subject exclude . If subject allergic egg ( use lipid emulsion ) , soybean ( use lipid emulsion ) , lipid emulsion subject exclude study . Subjects take antiplatelet agent ( antiplatelet agent hold seven day ) subject take anticoagulation therapy exclude . Subjects clinically significant medical issue history hematologic ( platelet < 100 ) , hepatic ( LFTs > 2X nl ) , renal ( Cr > 1.5 ) , pulmonary , cardiac abnormality ( include abnormal EKG ) also exclude .
